```

Description=Runs Greeting service at the top of the hour

[Timer]
OnCalendar=hourly ![1](Images/1.png)
```

```
FROM ubuntu:20.04 ![1](Images/1.png)
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.authors="Michael Hausenblas" ![2](Images/2.png)
COPY greeter.sh /app/ ![3](Images/3.png)
WORKDIR /app ![4](Images/4.png)
RUN chown -R 1001:1 /app ![5](Images/5.png)
USER 1001
ENTRYPOINT ["/app/greeter.sh"] ![6](Images/6.png)
```
